metadata.title: About Seedance 2.0 | AI Video Generation Platform
metadata.description: Learn about Seedance 2.0 ‚Äî the AI video generation platform making cinematic content creation accessible to everyone. Our mission: everyone can be a director.

hero.title: The Story Behind Seedance 2.0
hero.description:
What started as a simple idea has grown into something I'm truly proud of.
Seedance 2.0 is my way of bringing the power of AI video generation to creators everywhere.

team.title: Why I Built This
team.label: My Mission
team.description: As a solo creator, I believe everyone deserves access to professional-grade AI tools without the complexity or cost barriers.

items.title: Passion for Creation
items.description: I've always been fascinated by the intersection of technology and creativity. Seedance 2.0 is the result of that passion.

items.title: Simplicity First
items.description: Complex tools shouldn't require a manual. I've worked hard to make video generation as intuitive as possible.

items.title: Continuous Improvement
items.description: This is just the beginning. I'm constantly learning from user feedback to make Seedance better every day.

items.title: Community Driven
items.description: Your suggestions shape the roadmap. I read every email and genuinely value your input.

values.title: What I Stand For
values.description: These principles guide every decision I make for Seedance 2.0.

items.title: üéØ Quality Over Quantity
items.description: I'd rather do a few things exceptionally well than spread thin across many features.

items.title: ü§ù Honest Communication
items.description: No hidden fees, no surprises. What you see is what you get.

items.title: üöÄ Keep Innovating
items.description: AI moves fast, and so do I. Expect regular updates and new capabilities.

items.title: üí¨ Listen Carefully
items.description: Every piece of feedback is a gift. I take your suggestions seriously.

items.title: üåç Accessible to All
items.description: Great tools should be available to everyone, not just big studios.

items.title: ‚ù§Ô∏è Built with Care
items.description: This isn't just a product‚Äîit's something I genuinely believe in.

cta.title: Let's Create Something Together
cta.description: Have questions, ideas, or just want to say hi? I'd love to hear from you.
